Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is PORTUGAL ESTRELA. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 20 PT2. There are 8 Hydroelectric Power Plants at the municipalities of Manteigas and Seia at Serra da Estrela: - Vila Cova: entered service in 2001 and has an installed power of 23.4 MW, - Ponte Jugais: entered service in 1923 and has an installed power of 20.3 MW, - Senhora do Desterro: entered service in 1909 and has an installed power of 13.2 MW, - Sabugueiro I: entered service in 1947 and has an installed power of 12.8 MW, - Sabugueiro II: entered service in 1993 and has an installed power of 10 MW, - Caldas de Manteigas: entered service in 2000 and has an installed power of 7 MW, - Lagoa Comprida: entered service in 2003 and has an installed power of 0.6 MW, - Vale de Amoreira: entered service in 2004 and has an installed power of 0.3 MW.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Cordilheira Central (RR08). The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Manteigas. With stunning landscapes, Manteigas is a municipality with 4 parishes, in the district of Guarda in the Centre region of Portugal. Manteigas shares with the municipalities of Seia and Covilhã, the highest point in mainland Portugal at 1993 meters of altitude. The main village of Manteigas is located in the Zêzere Glacier Valley, which is a great example of landscape modeling by glaciers, with its 'U' shape. Historically, the most important economic activities in Manteigas are related to pastoralism, sheep's cheese production and wool industry.   The size of the area (km2) is 123.28. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 496. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is 1993. The total population (in thousand) is 3.007. The population density (Inhabitants/km2) in the LAU is 24.7. The population change rate of the LAU in the last 10 years (%) has been -0.15%. The overall regional population density (Inhabitants/km2) is 78.6. The regional population change rate in the last 10 years (%) has been -0.05%. The number of agricultural holdings in the LAU is 111. The nearest settlement with population over 100000 (km) is 77.2. In this region protected areas are present.   The primary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 20.11%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 34.59%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 45.30%. The primary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 13.25%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 48.20%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 38.55%.   Nowadays, there are eight hydroelectric power plants at Serra da Estrela, the first of which started operating more than a century ago (1909), when local industrialists realized the energetic potential in the hydraulic characteristics of the mountain. Value chain characteristic of the MRLs. Value chain highly connected to local natural assets.   Not identified. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is unspecified.
